title: 2020 Ram 1500 4X4 Laramie Hemi 5.7L V8
item_description:
2020 Ram 1500 4X4 Laramie Hemi 5.7L V8 - Sale Subject to Seller (Secured Creditor) Confirmation

Specifications

  • Year: 2020
  • Make: Ram
  • Model: 1500 Laramie
  • VIN: 1C6SRFJT6LN416272
  • License: 71493C3
    • Registration Expiration: 11/30/2025
  • Odometer Reads: 28,526 (will increase after smog)
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 7100lb
  • Drive Type: AWD/4WD
  • Engine: 5.7L V8 OHV 16V
  • Body Style: Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: 8-Speed Automatic
  • Tire Size: 275/55R20
  • Deck Length: 64”
  • Deck Width: 64”
  • Wall Height: 22”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Blue
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Leather
  • Interior Color: Black
  • Features:
    • Backup Camera
    • Bluetooth Hands-Free
    • Leather Seats
    • Multi-Zone Climate Control
    • Auxiliary Sound Port
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Premium Audio
    • Security System
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Air Conditioning
    • Touch Screen

Note: Vehicle currently has a paperless title. Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and smog certificate will be mailed several weeks after pickup, as the lien holder requests a paperless title from DMV, releases the lien and title/paperwork is signed by the Seller. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
